customMethods.name: setKpi1_AvailableTotal
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi1.props.params.Title = 'AVAILABLE/TOTAL BEDS'
	kpi1.props.params.Value1 = availableBeds
	kpi1.props.params.Value2 = totalBeds

customMethods.name: setKpi2_Utilization
customMethods.script:
kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")

	######
	query = """
DECLARE @fromDate datetime = ?
		,@toDate datetime = ?
			
;WITH cte AS (
SELECT [id]
	,[bedId]
	,[participantId]
	,[eventStart]
	,[eventEnd]
	,CASE WHEN [eventStart] < @fromDate THEN @fromDate ELSE eventStart END [correctedStart]
	, ISNULL([eventEnd], @toDate) [correctedEnd]
FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[BedLog]
WHERE ISNULL([eventEnd], @fromDate) >= @fromDate
AND [eventStart] <= @toDate
)

SELECT [id]
	,[bedId]
	,[participantId]
	,[eventStart]
	,[eventEnd]
	,[correctedStart]
	,[correctedEnd]
, DATEDIFF(hour,[correctedStart],[correctedEnd]) deltaHours
FROM cte	
	"""
	
	now = system.date.now()
	startCurrentMonth = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now),system.date.getMonth(now),1)
	currentMonthHours = system.date.hoursBetween(startCurrentMonth, now)
	totalHours = totalBeds * currentMonthHours
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [startCurrentMonth, now],'RITIOps')
	
	occupiedHours = 0
	for row in result: 
		occupiedHours += row['deltaHours']
		
	utilizationPercent = float(100 *occupiedHours) / totalHours if totalHours != 0 else 0
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('occupiedHours,currentMonthHours,totalBeds, totalHours ,  utilizationPercent:', occupiedHours,currentMonthHours,totalBeds, totalHours , utilizationPercent))
	
	kpi2.props.params.Title = 'UTILIZATION THIS MONTH'
	kpi2.props.params.Value = round(utilizationPercent,3)

customMethods.name: setKpi3_WaitListTrend
customMethods.script:
kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	kpi3.props.params.Value = []
	
	######
	query = """
DECLARE @fromDate datetime = ?,
		@toDate datetime = ?;
	
	WITH cte AS (
	SELECT [id]
		,[participantid]
		,[WaitListProgramId]
		,[details]
		,[dateadded]
		,[dateremoved]
		,CASE WHEN [dateadded] < @fromDate THEN @fromDate ELSE [dateadded] END AS [correctedDateadded]
		,CASE WHEN ISNULL([dateremoved], @toDate) <= @toDate THEN ISNULL([dateremoved], @toDate) ELSE @toDate END AS [correctedDateremoved]
	
	FROM [RITIOps].[shelter].[WaitList]
	WHERE [WaitList].[dateadded] <= @toDate
		AND ISNULL([dateremoved], @toDate) >= @fromDate
	)
	
	SELECT [id]
		,[participantid]
		,[WaitListProgramId]
		,[correctedDateadded]
		,[correctedDateremoved]
	
	FROM cte
	"""
	now = system.date.now()
	nowTime0 = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), system.date.getMonth(now), system.date.getDayOfMonth(now))
	fourMonthsBeforeTime0 = system.date.addMonths(nowTime0, -4)

	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [fourMonthsBeforeTime0, nowTime0],'RITIOps')
	
	_daysCount = system.date.daysBetween(fourMonthsBeforeTime0, nowTime0)
	_daysBetween =[system.date.addDays(fourMonthsBeforeTime0, i) for i in range(_daysCount)]
	
	
	data = []
	for _day in _daysBetween:
		_counter = 0
		for _row in result:
			_counter += 1 if _day >= _row['correctedDateadded'] and _day <= _row['correctedDateremoved'] else 0
		#data.append(dict(Enrollment = _counter, time = system.date.toMillis(_day)))
		data.append(dict(Enrollment = _counter, time = _day))
		
	series = [dict(data = data, name = "Enrollment")]
		
	#ystem.perspective.print(('data: ', data))
	
	kpi3.props.params.Title = 'WAITING LIST TREND'
	kpi3.props.params.Value = series

customMethods.name: setKpi4_AvgDaysPerOccupant
customMethods.script:
kpi4 = self.getChild("KPI4")
	
	######
	query = """
DECLARE @fromDate datetime = ?,
			@toDate datetime = ?
	
	;WITH cte AS (
	SELECT TOP (1000) [id]
		,[bedId]
		,[participantId]
		,[eventStart]
		,[eventEnd]
		,CASE WHEN [eventStart] < @fromDate THEN @fromDate ELSE [eventStart] END AS [correctedEventStart]
		,CASE WHEN ISNULL([eventEnd], @toDate) <= @toDate THEN ISNULL([eventEnd], @toDate) ELSE @toDate END AS [correctedEventEnd]
	FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[BedLog]
	WHERE ([BedLog].[eventStart]<= @toDate
			AND ISNULL([BedLog].[eventEnd],@toDate) >= @fromDate)
	)
	
	SELECT [id]
		,[bedId]
		,[participantId]
		,[eventStart]
		,[eventEnd]
		,[correctedEventStart]
		,[correctedEventEnd]
		,DATEDIFF(hour,[correctedEventStart],[correctedEventEnd])  hoursDiff
	FROM cte
	WHERE DATEDIFF(hour,[correctedEventStart],[correctedEventEnd]) > 1
	"""
	now = system.date.now()
	#nowTime0 = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), system.date.getMonth(now), system.date.getDayOfMonth(now))
	yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), 0, 1)

	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [yearStart, now],'RITIOps')

	sumHours = 0
	distinctParticipantList = []
	for _row in result:
		sumHours += _row['hoursDiff']
		if _row['participantId'] not in distinctParticipantList:
			distinctParticipantList.append(_row['participantId'])
	
	occupants = len(distinctParticipantList)
	avgDaysPerOccupant = round((sumHours / 24.0 / occupants),1) if occupants > 0 else 0
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('sumHours, occupants, avgDaysPerOccupant: ', sumHours, occupants, avgDaysPerOccupant ))
	
	kpi4.props.params.Title = 'Avg Days Per Occupant'
	kpi4.props.params.Value = avgDaysPerOccupant

customMethods.name: cleanKpis
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")
	kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	kpi4 = self.getChild("KPI4")	
	
	
	
	
	kpi1.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi1.props.params.Value1 = 0
	kpi1.props.params.Value2 = 0
	
	
		
	kpi2.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi2.props.params.Value = 0

	kpi3.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi3.props.params.Value = []

	kpi4.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi4.props.params.Value = 0

messageHandlers.script:
availableBeds = payload.get('availableBeds') 
	totalBeds = payload.get('totalBeds') 
	

	if totalBeds is None:
		# TODO: exec query and get totalBeds
		raise ValueError('Missing totalBeds')

	if availableBeds is None:
		raise ValueError('Missing availableBeds') # TODO: exec query and get totalBeds
		
	
	self.setKpi1_AvailableTotal(availableBeds, totalBeds)
	self.setKpi2_Utilization(totalBeds)
	self.setKpi3_WaitListTrend()
	self.setKpi4_AvgDaysPerOccupant()
